Title: Object: Jean Sans-Peur et Bajazet II
Description: John the Fearless and Bayazid I; John the fearless being captured at the battle of Nicopolis and being brought before the sultan, at left Bayazid is seated wearing a turban, he is pointing to John the Fearless who stands left of the sultan looking braviously ahead instead of bending towards the sultan, next to him two guards. 1873 Drypoint with surface tone
Producer name: Print made by: Edgar Alfred Baes
Associated names: Representation of: John the Fearless, Duke of Burgundy
Associated events: Associated Event: Battle of Nicopolis 1396 (25 September)
